mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM 46324_invoice_apply_header 4iah
del_flag = 1
del_flag = 0
AND LOWER(apply_header_number) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{applyHeaderNumber}), '%')
AND LOWER(bill_to_person) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{billToPerson}), '%')
AND LOWER(bill_to_phone) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{billToPhone}), '%')
AND LOWER(bill_to_address) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{billToAddress}), '%')
AND LOWER(bill_to_email) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{billToEmail}), '%')
AND LOWER(remark) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{remark}), '%')
